summary: The module is an example script that sets up a PyTorch Lightning trainer, loads a Megatron‑based Stable Diffusion model fine‑tuned with DreamBooth LoRA, applies necessary configuration tweaks, and runs inference to generate images from text prompts.
business_intent: Provide developers with a ready‑to‑run reference for performing text‑to‑image generation using a LoRA‑adapted DreamBooth diffusion model, facilitating rapid prototyping and deployment of customized image synthesis pipelines.
